test_cases.notes: Verified notification UI elements and line manager tagging options are visible. Request workflow displays clear status indicators (Pending, Approved, Processed, Rejected tabs). Employees can be selected for requests, and the system validates policy enrollment.

OBSERVATION: The current UI does NOT display air ticket balance/counter in the employee selection dropdown. Employees are listed by name only without any indication of available air ticket requests (no '0/1' notation or 'X available' text). This validates that the ambiguous '0/1' notation mentioned in tickets AV-6477 and AV-6343 is not currently visible in the dropdown - the balance information is simply not shown during employee selection.

Verified role-based access control is working. System correctly prevents air ticket requests for employees not enrolled in an air ticket policy. Error message 'You have not been added to a policy' is displayed when selecting an employee without policy access. Settings menu includes Role management section for configuring permissions.
